body_html: The anomaly checker doesn't check for denorms, and that's probably what's causing the slowdown (it really can accumulate to significant differences). IIRC we have a switch to enable FTZ and DAZ somewhere, but I can't remember where it is
body_text: The anomaly checker doesn't check for denorms, and that's probably what's causing the slowdown (it really can accumulate to significant differences). IIRC we have a switch to enable FTZ and DAZ somewhere, but I can't remember where it is
body: The anomaly checker doesn't check for denorms, and that's probably what's causing the slowdown (it really can accumulate to significant differences). IIRC we have a switch to enable FTZ and DAZ somewhere, but I can't remember where it is
